title: Ferrari, Ferrari, Ferrari - /DRIVE on NBC Sports: EP05  PT1
description:
On this episode of /DRIVE on NBC Sports, it's all about Ferrari. The icon in red. Racing heritage, brand cache, performance, they have it all. And now they have their own episode.


The La Ferrari is their newest in a long line of super performance cars, and Chris Harris goes to Italy to find out if it's worth all the press.

But first, Mike Spinelli investigates the story of a car that spent a lot of its life in hiding, buried in dirt. Yes, what once was the greatest home an earthworm ever had, is back on the road.
